text_block_list.name: Crowd
text_block_list.text: (Booing……)

text_block_list.name: Spectator A
text_block_list.text: I only wanted McQueen to win today…

text_block_list.name: Spectator B
text_block_list.text:
I had to set up a place for an entire week to see the 3 
consecutive wins in front of the audience.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Rice-san…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: hehe… Everyone is disappointed.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
McQueen-san seems to have a “Scenery” that she 
wanted to show me, but there is nothing different 
from the time of the “Kikkashou Award”.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Of course I knew this would happen. After all, my chest is hurt…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I also had a similar experience when I 
ran at the “Emperor Award” in autumn.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I have betrayed the expectations of many people, and I have not 
been able to firmly move forward.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: But, that was when I saw the “Scenery” in front of me.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: “Scenery”…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I'm sure you will be able to see it too 
Rice. Come on, let's go on stage.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Eh… Yeah!?

text_block_list.name: Crowd
text_block_list.text: (Booing……)

text_block_list.name: Spectator A
text_block_list.text:
Oh, Rice Shower is coming out! Why did you get in the way of the 
3 consecutive wins!!

text_block_list.name: Spectator B
text_block_list.text: We came here to see McQueen win!!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Bastards, we are gonna shout too! Rice good job! Awesome!!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl with Straight-cut Bangs
text_block_list.text: Congratulations, Rice-san!

text_block_list.name: Spectator C
text_block_list.text: hh…. That was a good run.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Hoo! You get it, Ok 1 more time with a higher voice!

text_block_list.name: Spectator C
text_block_list.text: eh!? ah, Yeah! That was a good run!!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: There are people who are cheering for Rice…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: This is a “Scenery” only seen by those who won the race.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Those who have expectations for me, those who did 
not expect it to come true. When you stand in this 
place, you can see all those different faces.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
It is important to accept the feelings of such people firmly 
here. That is the duty and pride of the winner

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Duty and pride of the winner…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
For those who have little expectations, and for those who have 
not fulfilled their expectations, Hold your chest high.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Now, show me a figure worthy of the winner.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Yeah!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
People who are disappointed because of Rice will also be 
disappointed if Rice does not do well.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Rice will hold her chest high. Look at everyone's faces firmly, 
continue running from now on…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Someday, I will become a Horse Girl that can make everyone happy!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I'm looking forward to it, Rice-san.

The winning live of Rice Shower, which 
limited the work of Mejiro McQueen.

However, it was different from the time of the “Kikkashou Award”, 
the voice of the song felt very powerful.
Great work today, McQueen.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Rice-san seems to have realized what she was missing.
I saw the winning live, and I understood it well.
I saw the winning live, and I understood it well.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
That was not cool at all. It was I who asked her to race with me 
and I ended up losing.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: For real… That was an amazing run.
As Mejiro McQueen said, today's Rice Shower had an amazing run.

But, Mejiro McQueen ran in the “Emperor Prize” in the hope that 
her feelings could be conveyed.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Sob… Sobbing…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I was just one step away… I would've won it… hic!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Sob… Trainer-san! Sobbing… Hic!!

The role of an ace and her feeling for the “Emperor Prize”, there 
is nothing but gratitude to Mejiro McQueen, who ran bearing those 
2 heavy feelings on her back.
I'm sure those feelings were also transmitted to Rice Shower.
One day a boy came to visit the lonely wizard.
“I want to fly in the sky like a bird”.

The wizard uses her magic with pleasure, and the boy whose wish 
came true with a smile said. Wow! That's amazing, amazing!!
Then, the people who saw it came to gather around the Wizard.

There are still people who are scared, but the smiles began to 
gradually increase around them.

The wizard used a lot of magic to make everyone 
happy with her natural power.
But suddenly, the wizard couldn't use magic anymore.
The wizard used too much magic, and ended up collapsing.

People who have been afraid of the wizard until now, realized how 
hard the wizard worked to make everyone happy.
Knowing the true feelings of the wizard, they looked after her.

And once again, everyone began to look forward to when the magic 
of happiness could be used.
